name: FileName
If System Config Does Not Exist
Default System Config
Initialize Constants
func:
const { NIGHT_SOUND, WAKE_SOUND, RELAXATION_SOUND } = msg.payload

const audio = {
    NIGHT_SOUND: 'NIGHT_SOUND',
    WAKE_SOUND: 'WAKE_SOUND',
    RELAXATION_SOUND: 'RELAXATION_SOUND'
}

const audio_player_states = {
    PAUSED: 'PAUSED',
    PLAYING: 'PLAYING',
    STOPPED: 'STOPPED',
    RESUMED: 'RESUMED'
}

flow.set('audio', audio)
flow.set('audio_player_states', audio_player_states)

flow.set(audio.NIGHT_SOUND, NIGHT_SOUND)
flow.set(audio.WAKE_SOUND, WAKE_SOUND)
flow.set(audio.RELAXATION_SOUND, RELAXATION_SOUND)

flow.set('current_audio_playing', null)

msg.payload = `amixer -M set ${audio_device} ${ msg.payload }%`

return msg

name: Schedex Input Template
Process Bedtime Event
Process Waketime Event
Process Sunrise Event
Process Sunset Event
Timezone Offset
Adjust Max Brightness
Revert to Previous
API Config
Fade Counter
Toggle Fade On
Toggle Fade Off
Fade Counter
Toggle On
Adjust Max Brightness
Revert to Previous
Toggle Off
Initialize Constants
func:
const { NIGHT_LIGHT, WAKE_LIGHT } = msg.payload

const lights = {
    NIGHT_LIGHT: 'NIGHT_LIGHT',
    WAKE_LIGHT: 'WAKE_LIGHT'
}

const light_states = {
    OFF: 'OFF',
    FADE_ON: 'FADE_ON',
    FADE_OFF: 'FADE_OFF',
    ON: 'ON',
    ADJUST_BRIGHTNESS: 'ADJUST_BRIGHTNESS'
}

flow.set('lights', lights)
flow.set('light_states', light_states)

flow.set(lights.NIGHT_LIGHT, NIGHT_LIGHT)
flow.set(lights.WAKE_LIGHT, WAKE_LIGHT)

flow.set('night_light_current_brightness', 0)
flow.set('wake_light_current_brightness', 0)

name: Event Type Missing
Error Handler
func:
msg.payload = msg.error

return msg;

name: Update Event Data
Object Filter (Light)
Bad Request Handler
Object Filter (Sound)
Sound Object Filter (On Payload)
func:
const { onpayload } = msg.payload.sound
const falsy = !onpayload
const is_not_an_object = typeof onpayload !== 'object'
const is_array = Array.isArray(onpayload)
const is_a_function = typeof onpayload === 'function'

const error_message = 'onpayload property must be an object'

if (falsy || is_not_an_object || is_array || is_a_function) 
    throw new Error(error_message)

return msg

name: Delete Audio Config
Initialize Loop Through Events
func:
const events = msg.payload

msg.eventKeys = Object.keys(events)
msg.events = events
msg.counter = 0

return msg;

name: Loop Through Events
func:
const { events, counter, eventKeys } = msg
const name = eventKeys[counter]

msg.payload = events[name]

msg.counter++

return msg;

const type = msg.payload

msg.payload = event[type]

return msg

name: Initialize Constants

const password = "'systemsecured'"

const encode_password = `wpa_passphrase ${ssid} ${password}`

msg.payload = encode_password

return msg;
